The HABits Lab Presents Advanced Research in Ubiquitous Computing at ACM Ubicomp 2018

Three lab members presented a paper, poster, and demo exhibiting their exciting new work in health technology.

January 11, 2018

ubicomp

PhD Students from The Health Aware Bits (HABits) Lab presented their new work, which focuses on cultivating a healthy lifestyle assisted by technology at the 2018 ACM International Joint Conference on Pervasive and Ubiquitous Computing (UBICOMP 2018). The event was held at the Suntec Singapore Convention and Exhibition Center (colocated with ISWC 2018) October 9-11th in Singapore.: full story

  • Lab Director- Nabil Alshurafa
